characteristics.name: Details
characteristics.value: Choose a friendly ASURYANI unit within 24" of the psyker. Until your next Psychic phase, whenever that unit suffers a wound, roll a D6. On a 5+ that wound is ignored. If a unit already has an ability with a similar effect (e.g. the Avatar of Khaine's Molten Body ability) this psychic power does not affect them.
